abstract.t: Currently, in Mobile IP when an MN moves from one FA to anotherFA/CoA, relevant resources at the previous FA are consumed untilits visitor entry for the MN expires. The Resource Release Messageand Resource Management Extension described in this draft willfacilitate the release of these valuable resources at the previous FAas the MN moves to a new location. The HA notifies the previous FA ofany changes in the CoA for an MN, thereby allowing the FA to releaseits resources.
